action.selector: #container > .blog-title-outer + div[class^=entry_box_left], #container > div[class^=entry_box_left] + div[class^=entry_box_right], #main > .column-inner:only-child > .column-inner-2:only-child > .entry_box101:nth-child(-n+2), #main > .column-inner > .column-inner-2 > div[class^=entry_box102], .article-body-more > div[style^="padding: 1px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 20px; overflow:hidden;"]
#main > div.column-inner > div.column-inner-2 > div[style="height:440px; overflow: auto; text-align:left; "]
